[\[260a.1\]]pa med pa'i skad cig ni/_gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi/_/rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin/_/rnam smin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes/_/de tshe skad cig gcig shes bya/_/zhes pa ni chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa byed pa med pa dmigs pa med par pha
[\[260a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o//_//mtshan nyid med pa'i skad cig ma ni/_/sbyin la sogs la spyod pa yis/_/chos kun rmi lam 'drar gnas nas/_/chos kun mtshan nyid med par ni/_/skad cig ma ni gcig
[\[260a.3\]]gis rtogs/_/zhes pa ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma la sogs pa lta bu'i nyer len gyi phung po lnga la gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs pa ni rmi lam la sogs pa la mtshan nyid med do/_/gnyis su med pa'i skad cig ma ni/_rmi lam dang ni de mthong nyid/_/gnyis kyi tshul du mi
[\[260a.4\]]mthong ltar/_/chos rnams gnyis su med par ni/_/skad cig ma ni gcig gis mthong /_/zhes pa ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma la sogs pa lta bu'i nyer len gyi phung po lnga la gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs pa ni mi mthong rmi lam rmi ba po mi mthong zhes pa la sogs pas bstan/_
[\[260a.5\]]ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni/_thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni/_/zag med chos kun rnam kun du/_/rnam par dag 'gyur gang dag yin/_/de dag rang gi mtshan nyid can/_/zhes pa ni zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni ma bcos pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o/_/
[\[260a.6\]]mtshan nyid med pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o//_//le'u 'di nas 'gro rnams zhi ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ston pa ni zhus lan drug_/phyogs bskor bdun/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ste bzhi bcu ston pa las/_'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni/_/bsdu rnams
[\[260a.7\]]bzhi la 'god pa dang /_/kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yis/_/rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang /_/bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can gyi/_/don dang pha rol phyin drug dang /_/sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis/_/stong pa nyid dang gnyis zad dang /_/brda dang dmigs pa med
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]pa dang /_/lus can rnams ni yongs smin dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni/_/mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang /_/byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas zhing /_/rnam par dag dang nges pa dang /_/sems can don ni tshad med dang /_/sangs rgyas bsten sogs yon tan dang /_/byang chub
[\[260b.2\]]yan lag las rnams ni/_/chud mi za dang bden mthong dang /_/phyin ci log ni spongs pa dang /_/de bzhin med pa'i tshul dang ni/_/rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni/_/'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas/_/tha dad nyid du mi mthong dang /_/mya ngan 'das la 'god pa ni/_/chos kyi sku yi
[\[260b.3\]]phrin las te/_/rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod/_/ces pa las/_dang po ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dngos po ma mchis pa rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la sems bskyed nas sems can gyi don mi 'thad do zhus pa'i lan/_chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[260b.4\]]thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yin yang /_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'khrul nas/_rmi lam mthong ngo rmi lam rmi ba po yang mthong ngo la sogs te/_dge mi dge'i las kyis 'gro drug gi snang ba shar bas byang chub sems dpa' don mdzad do/_/gnyis pa rab 'byor gyis smras
[\[260b.5\]]pa/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sems can gyi don mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa la sems bskyed nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can gyi don mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos so/_/gsum pa rab 'byor gyis
[\[260b.6\]]gsol pa/_nyan rang la ma mchis pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ro/_/phyogs bskor bdun ni/_ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams la gzigs na/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[260b.7\]]rnams ched du bsams nas phyogs bcu'i dmyal ba/_phyogs bcu'i dud 'gro/_phyogs bcu'i yi dgas/_phyogs bcu'i 'dod lha/_phyogs bcu'i gzugs khams kyi lha/_phyogs bcu'i mi rnams kyi don byed pa mthong ngo /_/bsdu ba bzhi ni zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /_chos
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]kyi sbyin pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi chos sku dang /_mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i longs sku dang /_yi ges yi ge med pa'i don rtogs par gyis shig ces pa yan chod chos kyi sbyin
[\[261a.2\]]pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod pa ni snyan par smra ba dang /_de drug gi don la don spyod pa ni don spyod pa dang /_de drug dang mi 'gal ba ni don mthun pa'o/_/sprul pa'i sku'i zhus lan gsum ni rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags na/_byang chub sems
[\[261a.3\]]dpas pha rol tu phyin pa drug nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la spyad de/_sems can la chos ston pa lags/_stong pa la ni sems can ma mchis/_sems can ma mchis pas gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du ma mchis lags so zhus pa'i lan/_sems can med pas stong pa bco
[\[261a.4\]]brgyad du rig par bya'o/_/gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du bdag nyid kyis stong pa rig nas gzhan la stong pa nyid du ston te/_dper na/_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pas sprul pa mang po sprul te/_la la sbyin pa nas la la rnam mkhyen gyi bar la bkod na gang yang bkod pa yod snyam mam/_
[\[261a.5\]]de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du ma bcings ma grol/_ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ma yin te/_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar shes na chos kyi dbyings la 'gal
[\[261a.6\]]ba med do/_/gnod pa med do/_/zhus lan gnyis pa gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin na/_las rgyu 'bras mi 'thad de/_chos kyi dbyings la rnam par dag pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o zhes
[\[261a.7\]]pa la/_bka' stsal pa/_las rgyu 'bras kun rdzob tu gsungs kyi/_don dam par ma yin no/_/zhus lan gsum pa bsgoms pa dang ma bsgoms pas rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag char phye nas bstan pa ma yin na/_kun sbyor gsum spangs pa'i phyir rgyun zhugs
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]thob po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhus pa'i lan/_rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mtshan nyid med par khong du chud pa'i tshe/_bdag nyid dge ba'i lam la spyod cing gzhan ma la 'god pa'i dpe ni sprul pa de dge ba spyod kyang de'i ro myang ba ni
[\[261b.2\]]med do/_/mtshan dpe'i le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o//_//le'u 'di nas kun nas nyon mongs pas rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang /_bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa'i phrin las dang gnyis las/_dang po la gsum ni/_rab 'byor
[\[261b.3\]]gyis gsol pa/_ji ltar chos rnams mtshan nyid med par rtogs lags/_lan sprul pa ni nyon mongs pa dmigs pa bcu gcig gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la spyod pa med pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa gang la yang mi spyod na chos kyi tshul rtogs pa yin no/_/
[\[261b.4\]]gnyis pa gsol pa/_phung po lnga sprul pa lta bu lags na/_sprul pa la ni phung po lnga kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba 'gro ba lnga ma mchis na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthur 'gyur lags/_lan byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spyod pa'i tshe/_'gro ba lnga la sogs pa la dmigs
[\[261b.5\]]te/_sprul pa lta bur shes so/_/mthong ngo /_/rtogs so/_/gsol pa sprul pa lta bur rtogs lags na gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la spyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/_lan gal te sems can rnams
[\[261b.6\]]rang rang gis sprul pa lta bur ma shes pa'i don du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do/_/gsum pa chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la sogs pa lags na sems can rnams ci la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams yum la spyod cing sems can rnams gyen du bskyod pa lags/_lan sems
[\[261b.7\]]can rnams ni ming dang mtshan ma med pa la zhen pa lags/_de'i log rtogs 'gegs pa'o/_/bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can gyi don byed pa la gnyis las dang po gsol pa/_chos thams cad ming dang mtshan mar bas la/_chos su rtogs pa las byung ba lags na byang chub sems dpa'
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]yum la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag gzhan dge la spyod cing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la gzhol ba lags/_lan thal ba ni gal te dngos po'am dngos po'i mtshan ma gcig yod na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/_bdag gzhan dge ba
[\[262a.2\]]la spyod cing sems can rnams theg pa gsum la gzhol ba la sbyor bar mi 'gyur bar thal ba las/_ldog pa dngos po dang dngos po'i mtshan ma med pas na byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
[\[262a.3\]]'dres pa'i bar rang rdzogs par byas nas gzhan dge ba la sbyor te/_gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo cha shas bzhag pa tsam cig yod kyang byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/_mtshan ma med pa dran pa med pa yid la byed pa med par sangs rgya bar mi 'gyur te/_sems can rnams
[\[262a.4\]]kyang 'jog par mi 'gyur bar thal ba las/_de las zlog pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa la sogs pa lags na/_'di dag ni dmigs pa bcu gcig 'phags pa'i gang zag go zhes ji ltar 'brang bar bgyi'i lan/_mtshan ma med pa la yang gzhan
[\[262a.5\]]la chos de rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/_gsol pa de lta ma lags so/_/mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa yin nam/_gsol pa de ma lags so/_/rnam grangs des na chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/_de ni pha rol tu phyin pa nas
[\[262a.6\]]rnam mkhyen gyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam thar sgo gsum la spyod pas/_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la slob pa yin no/_/zhus lan gnyis pa/_phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag la bslabs na chos kyi dbyings
[\[262a.7\]]rnam par dkrug par mi 'gyur ram/_lan chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang med pas/_dmigs pa bcu gcig la sogs pa chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o/_/gsol pa chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]na/_byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pas/_ji ltar gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la med pa la bslab par bgyi/_tha dad med pa la tha dad du bslabs na phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ram/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang gzhan ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings
[\[262b.2\]]kyang gzhan ma lags so/_/de'i lan gzugs dang rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang gzhan ma yin pas byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma mthong ste/_chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas ming med pa la ming gi brdas
[\[262b.3\]]ston te 'di ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ro zhes bya bar ston to/_/dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis rdzas kyi rnam pa gyi na zhig la brten te gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs glang po nas sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yan lag rdzogs pa'i bar du bstan na/_de la sems can byis pa'i ngang tshul can dag
[\[262b.4\]]de la ngo mtshar du 'dzin/_skyes bu mkhas shing gsal ba mgo skor du go/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma mthong yang /_thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang /_sems can mi dmigs
[\[262b.5\]]par sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du bdag kyang spyod gzhan yang spyod du 'jug chos kyi dbyings dus gsum du 'gyur ba med pa sems can rnams la ston to/_/mnyam pa nyid kyi le'u ste re bzhi pa'o//_//le'u 'di nas phrin las lnga las/_dang po pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni zhus pa/_
[\[262b.6\]]sems can dang sems can du gdags pa dmigs su ma mchis na su'i don du byang chub sems dpa' yum sgom pa lags/_lan thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams la yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'god pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/_
[\[262b.7\]]sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'god cing drug po de nyid rang bzhin gyis stong zhing mi dmigs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi mdzad pa ni dge ba bcu nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la bdag nyid gnas shing sems can gzhan 'god
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]do/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi mdzad pa la zhus lan gnyis las/_dang po ni gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la ni sems can dang chos dang chos ma yin pa yang ma dmigs na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar thams cad mkhyen
[\[263a.2\]]pa nyid kyi don du 'jug la/_lan de de bzhin te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa lags na chos de rnams ma dmigs so/_/gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhig ma yin na ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la gnas te sangs
[\[263a.3\]]rgyas nas rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi ston te/_rab 'byor gyis gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/de bas na gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhes bya bar chos ston to/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhes bya ba'i go ba ni
[\[263a.4\]]'jig par mi 'gyur/_phyis med par 'gro ba ma yin/_'phel 'grib med/_skye 'gag med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med de yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa 'gro 'ong med pa de la gnas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub la 'jug pa med pa'i tshul gyis
[\[263a.5\]]'jug ste/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong nas/_sgrib pa'i chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis nas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du mi dmigs na/_bla na med pa'i byang chub la dngos por the
[\[263a.6\]]tshom lta ga la 'ong /_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas 'khor rnam pa bzhi la chos bstan yang rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa thob pa med pa bzhin du phyin ci log gi skyes bu phyin ci ma log pa la 'god do/_/gang la phyin ci log med pa de la bdag nas rnam
[\[263a.7\]]mkhyen gyi bar du med do/_/gang la gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du med pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid de/_de la gnas shing phyin ci log tu gyur pa sems can gyi 'du shes gzugs kyi 'du shes zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du shes las 'grel to/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nas
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du don dam pa ni ma yin te/_'dus ma byas ma skyes pa 'byung ba med pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ste/_bdag nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du med do/_/byang chub
[\[263b.2\]]sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yongs su shes pa las lam gyi don du byang chub la 'jug pa med/_de ni snga phyi bar gsum du rang bzhin gyis mi stong pa ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/_sems can yongs su smin
[\[263b.3\]]pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhus lan gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin
[\[263b.4\]]stong pa nyid la spyod cing /_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang gzhan la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan yang zhes 'gal bar mi bgyid/_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do zhes brjod pa ni ngo mtshar to/_/de'i lan gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar
[\[263b.5\]]yang gzhan ma yin rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/_gal te gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar rang bzhin stong pa ma yin na ni/_rang bzhin gyis stong par khong du chud nas sangs mi rgya bar thal ba las/_rang bzhin gyis stong pa ni 'jig pa'am rtag tu gnas
[\[263b.6\]]pa'am 'gro sa med de/_gzhan du na 'jig rten rnams ni rmongs shing phung po la mngon par zhen pas skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal las mi grol lo/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar stong
[\[263b.7\]]ngam mi stong zhes rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni 'di ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ro/_/'di ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar stong pa nyid do zhes rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do/_/dper na nam mkha' ni nam mkha' 'khrug
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar yang stong pa nyid 'khrug par mi byed do/_/stong pa nyid kyang de rnams 'khrug par mi byed de/_gnyis ka dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/gnyis zad kyi mdzad pa ni/_gal te chos thams cad
[\[264a.2\]]ma mchis lags na bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur/_gnyis su 'byed pa la ni byang chub ma mchis so/_/lan de de bzhin no/_/gnyis la spyod pa la byang chub med do/_/byang chub ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen
[\[264a.3\]]gyi bar la mi spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni bdag gam bdag gir bya ba med pa ste/_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la bdag gam bdag gir bya ba med do/_byang chub 'dzin pa dang mi 'dzin pa gang la yang mi spyod do/_/gsol pa 'o na byang chub ci la spyod lags/_
[\[264a.4\]]lan mgo bsgre ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am mi 'dzin pa gang la spyod/_lan dgra bcom pa la nyal ba ma mchis na rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am mi 'dzin pa gang yang mi spyod do/_/brda'i mdzad pa ni gsol pa byang chub 'dzin pa
[\[264a.5\]]dang mi 'dzin pa gang la yang mi spyod/_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la yang mi spyod na/_spyir lugs kyis ni phar phyin nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgya/_phar phyin nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma rdzogs na sangs rgya bar mi nus
[\[264a.6\]]so/_/lan phar phyin nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar ma rdzogs na sangs mi rgya rdzogs na sangs rgya zhes pa de bas gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar de yang rang bzhin la gnas te sangs rgya'o/_/rang bzhin de yang nye bar zhi ba ste/_'phel 'grib med/_skye 'gag med/_kun nas nyon
[\[264a.7\]]mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba med/_thob pa dang mngon par rtogs pa med de/_'jig rten gyi tha snyad du sangs rgya'i don dam par ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar du ma yin no/_/de bas na sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_byang chub la spyod kyang sems dang sems can
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/_/mgo bsgre ba ni rab 'byor dgra bcom pa thob ces pa de dag dmigs par 'gyur ram/_/gsol pa ma lags so/_/'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis bstan pa lags so/_/don de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam mkhyen
[\[264b.2\]]gyi bar yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du btags pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni chos gang yang 'phel 'grib bam phan gnod gang yang mi dmigs te chos kyi rang bzhin nye bar gzung na chos rnams kyi rang bzhin la ma dmigs na/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar
[\[264b.3\]]du dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_de ltar byang chub la spyod cing sangs rgyas te sems can gyi don byed do/_/chos nyid 'khrug pa med pa'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o//_//le'u 'di nas mi dmigs pa dang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phrin las gnyis ston pa las/_
[\[264b.4\]]dang po la zhus lan bdun ni gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar rdzogs par bgyis kyang sangs mi rgya lags sam/_lan byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la spyod kyang /_de dag
[\[264b.5\]]kyang mi dmigs de las gzhan du'ang mi spyod na/_byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur te/_yum la de ltar spyod na bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgya'o/_/zhus lan gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi lam la brtson par bgyid pa lags/_de'i
[\[264b.6\]]lan gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/_gang sbyar bar bya ba'am dbye bar bya ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/zhus lan gsum pa ni gang sbyar ba'am dbye bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ma mchis na/_yum la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_yum la ma bslabs na sangs

[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/_so so'i skye bo nas sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid la khyad med pa'i phyir ro/_/zhus lan gnyis pa/_chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la khyad ma mchis na/_ji ltar dkon mchog gsum 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_
[\[269b.2\]]lan dkon mchog kyang gzhan chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin te/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/zhus lan gsum pa de bzhin
[\[269b.3\]]gshegs pa chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo la sogs pa thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g.yo ba lags sam/_lan de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid brgyad gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo la sogs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid do/_/
[\[269b.4\]]zhus lan bzhi pa so so'i skye bo nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar gyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid lags na/_'di ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gcig la gcig 'dus pa/_gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi chos nyid gzhan dang gzhan la
[\[269b.5\]]bslabs nas phar phyin drug rdzogs nas sems can smin par bgyid pa lags zer ba'i lan ni gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi chos nyid stong pa nyid ma yin snyam mam/_gsol pa de lta ma lags so/_/stong pa nyid la gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar gyi mtshan nyid de yod
[\[269b.6\]]snyam mam/_ma lags so/_/de lta bas na chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la so so'i skye bo nas 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams med/_so so'i skye bo nas 'phags pa'i gang zag las gud na'ang de med par rig par bya'o/_/zhus lan lnga pa chos nyid de 'dus byas lags
[\[269b.7\]]sam/_'dus ma byas lags/_lan ni gnyis ka ma yin te/_'dus byas las gud na yang 'dus ma byas med/_don dam pa la lus ngag dang yid med/_de gsum las gud na'ang don dam pa med de/_chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa ni don dam pa ste/_byang
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa'i tshe/_don dam pa las kyang mi g.yo la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/_/don dam pa'i rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste don gcig pa'o//_//mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdzad pa las zhus lan drug las/_dang po gsol pa/_chos
[\[270a.2\]]thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa stong pa ste/_byed pa dang bya ba ma mchis kyang byang chub sems dpa' yum la spyod pa don dam pa las mi g.yo lags/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can gyi don bgyid lags/_lan ni don dam la ci yang med kyang sems can rang bzhin gyis stong pa
[\[270a.3\]]nyid ma shes pa byed pa'i skyes bu bcu gnyis su 'du shes pa dang /_phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang rten 'brel dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi 'du shes dang phral nas mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god do/_/zhus lan gnyis pa/_gsol pa cis stong pa lags/_lan 'du shes thams cad kyis stong ste/_sprul
[\[270a.4\]]pa cig sprul na de stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i dngos po gang yang med pas 'di ni sprul pa'o/_/'di ni stong pa'o zhes dmigs su med do/_/zhus lan gsum pa phung po lnga yang sprul pa'o/_/zhus lan bzhi pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas sangs rgyas kyi bar yang sprul pa lags
[\[270a.5\]]sam/_lan ni nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa las dang nyon mongs pa'ang sprul pa'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa spang ba thams cad kyang sprul pa'o/_/zhus lan lnga pa sprul pa dang ma sprul pa de gang lags/_de'i lan skye ba dang 'gag pa'i chos thams cad sprul pa/_ma skyes ma 'gags
[\[270a.6\]]pa mi mnyam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma sprul pa'o/_/zhus lan drug pa nyan thos la sogs pa gang gis kyang mdzad pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/_de'i lan sngon dngos po yod par gyur la/_phyis dngos po med par 'gyur ba'am/_rang gi dngos po'am/_gzhan gyi dngos po yang med na/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
[\[270a.7\]]ces bya ba'i chos nyid gcig yod par 'gyur re skan no/_/chos nyid mi 'gyur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu don gnyis pa'o//_//stong phrag brgya pa'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta d+harma shrIs mdzad do zhes grag go//_//_
